metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3755 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: decoder/ih264d_parse_pslice.c in mediaserver in Android 6.x before2016-07-01 does not properly select concealment frames, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via acrafted media file, aka internal bug 28470138.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
